title: ARAM: Can we please have the old aram as an option?
body: Can we please have the old aram as an option? Prefer the old one. This new one makes me feel like a preschooler.

replies.body:
Howling Abyss will be back after the Bilgewater Event :)

We know people like it (I do, too!) and we're not taking it away. ^__^
I just spent five minutes giggling after I read your name xD
But will you be taking away Butcher's Bridge? It would be great if ARAM alternated between the two maps to break away some of the repetitiveness. Also we'd miss the sharks in the canal :(

this map is very busy. I have a hard time keeping track of my mouse cursor in teamfights now it is even harder. also, if anyone has any advice or tips about keeping track of where they're cursor is please share them

Yay, Howling Abyss will return! Thank goodness Rito didn't force this new bit onto us forever... unlike a certain *ahem* HUD *ahem*

Honestly though, I keep pressing buttons but my screen on summoner's rift still looks funny... maybe I'll find the right button to go back to the old HUD? 

Hm... is it pressing "H" for HUD? No? Maybe it's pressing "O" for Old? Hmm no that didn't seem to work either.. wait I've got it! Alt + F4 gets rid of the nasty new HUD!

Woohoo! Problem solved.
